long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The fastest, cleanest, easiest way to scan edit and copy tailwind components

Tailwind Scanner is the fastest way to inspect and edit tailwind css. Ditch Inspect element forever for this cleaner UI. Visualize the css of any element and copy its entire css rules with a single click. Then edit on the fly and export elements to tailscan.

If you have any feature requests or improvements you'd like to see, please let us know!

Try the extension out yourself at: https://tailwindscanner.com/
